subject: Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Derrick Rose, 22, became the youngest player to win the N.B.A.’s Most Valuable Player award, and is the only Bull to do so other than Michael Jordan.
snippet: Derrick Rose, 22, became the youngest player to win the N.B.A.’s Most Valuable Player award, and is the only Bull to do so other than Michael Jordan.
